item.title: Drone Controller Design Pt. 1
item.author: ricardo.chin@tecnico.ulisboa.pt (Ricardo Chin)
item.description: Controller Design Pt. 1 # tip If you wish to skip the theoretical and implementation details, please click here to jump to the summarized findings Ch. 9 - Piloting in a Loop. I have cool images! ✌️ 1 Continuing from Section 1… # Previously, I had addressed problem formulation and initial approaches. The primary tasks included studying the system and subsystems, creating a state-space model for the dynamical system, analyzing aspects like linearity, stability, controllability, and observability, developing Simulink models, proposing classical state feedback control, and validating the simulator for the developed models.
